page.title: 05BRYN-EDUCATION IN VILLAGE
page.content:
ONLY ONE SCHOOL IN BRYN-BRYN PRIMARY. TOTAL OF {74}CHILDREN AT SCHOOL,AGES FROM 3 UP TO 11.THERE ARE FOUR MEMBER- S OF TEACHING STAFF:MR.G.L.LEWIS,HEAD- TEACHER;MRS.C.J.GALE,D/HEAD,MR.R.H.PHI LLIPS,ASST.TEACHER,MRS.A.M.CURTIS,ASST TEACHER,MORNINGS ONLY.THERE IS ALSO A NURSERY NURSE,MRS.B.JONES.THERE ARE 5 MEMBERS OF NON-TEACHING STAFF:MRS.COY- DE,SCHOOL SECRETARY;MRS.WILLIAMS,SCHO- OL COOK;MISS.JONES,MRS.MORGAN,KITCHEN
STAFF & SUPERVISOR;MRS.ROWLAND,CARETA- KER.THERE ARE ALSO PERIPATETIC STAFF, MRS.B.BARTLETT(REMEDIAL),MISS.J.DOWNIE & MRS.P.JAMES(VIOLIN).CLASS 4-25;CLASS 3-16;CLASS 2-20;CLASS 1(NURSERY)-13 . THE SCHOOL HAS AN OFFICIAL UNIFORM OF GREEN AND GOLD.
